# OnlinerBaseType&lt;T&gt;.InstanceMinValue property

Gets the minimal value allowed for this tag. The default min. value is minimum of this type if [`AttributeMinimum`](./AttributeMinimum.md) is not set. If the [`AttributeMinimum`](./AttributeMinimum.md) property is set then `InstanceMinValue` will return its value.

```csharp
public abstract T InstanceMinValue { get; }
```
